content.rendered:
Did you know that 50% of dirt and moisture is collected on the first 10 feet of a mat?  STOP your problems at the door with specialized matting solutions from Mr. Janitorial Supplies.  The function of our program is to effectively “Stop, Catch, Trap, Hold and Hide” soil and moisture all year round!

We also offer anti-fatigue matting, which has been proven to increase productivity levels and safety within the workplace. Our anti-fatigue matting line also comes in grease proof rubber; the perfect application for restaurants and bars. Additional applications for anti-fatigue and anti-slip matting are: grocery stores, cashiers, machine-operators and industrial work stations. Safety is the key to success in any operation.

Please contact us today for more information.  We offer all matting sizes and colours in custom orders.  Let us help keep your workplace safe, dry, and clean!
